document_data.name: Talona's Grimace
document_data.symptoms: Reduced movement, facial twitching and trembling, drained health
document_data.mainbody: '''Talona's grimace''' was a lung [[disease]] that slowly drained the health of the infected being.
document_data.Infection: One could only catch this disease from being caught within the [[Talona|Talonite]] [[spell]], ''[[cloud of pestilence]]'', for a prolonged period.
document_data.Effects: Once contracted, the movement of the diseased creature was slightly reduced. Their facial muscles would sometimes tremble and twitch, giving rise to a grimace, hence the name of the condition. From day to day, the infected being would lose health until they died.
document_data.Curing: ''Talona's grimace'' could be cured by [[magic]]al or natural means (via herbal medicine).
